text: Aur Samood ki taraf humne unke bhai Saleh ko bheja. Usne kaha, “aey meri qaum ke logon, Allah ki bandagi karo, uske siwa tumhara koi khuda nahin hai. Wahi hai jisne tumko zameen se paida kiya hai aur yahan tumko basaya hai. Lihaza tum ussey maafi chaho aur uski taraf palat aao. Yaqeenan mera Rubb qareeb hai aur woh duaon ka jawab dene wala hai”
